summary.p: Right-aligns the characters in a specified string, padding on the left with spaces for a specified total length.

syntax.code: RPAD(str AS string, totalWidth AS int) RETURNS string

param.name: totalWidth
param.p: The number of characters in the resulting string, equal to the number of original characters plus any additional padding characters.

returns.p: A string that is equivalent to str, but right-aligned and padded on the left with as many spaces as needed to create a length of totalWidth. Or, if totalWidth is less than the length of str, a string that is identical to str.
